description: Main entry point for a Flutter app that renders multiple HTML templates within a WebView. Defines app initialization, route configuration, and UI setup.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Stateless widget that sets up the MaterialApp, including theme and home page with predefined WebView routes.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes web content debugging and runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the MaterialApp widget, setting up themes and routes for WebView screens.
